data.title: Sanjay Dutt & Govinda remain the most underrated duo of Indian cinema with 6 hits & 1 flop
meta_keywords: Sanjay Dutt Govinda Bollywood’s most underrated duo Jodi No 1 Haseena Maan Jayegi Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
Sanjay Dutt Govinda action comedy films 6 hits 1 flop
Sanjay Dutt Govinda iconic Bollywood duo 6 hits 1 flop cult comedy film Haseena Maan Jayegi
Sanjay Dutt Govinda action films box office hits Andolan
data.meta_description: Sanjay Dutt and Govinda have starred in seven films together out of which six were huge box office hits while one was a box office flop. Three of those films were cult comedies - Haseena Maan Jayegi, Jodi No. 1 and Ek Aur Ek Gyarah.
data.text:
While Hindi cinema has seen a number of successful on-screen pairings, the one that remains the most underrated and lesser-talked about in today’s day and age is that of Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

The two actors are poles apart in terms of personality, acting style and the kind of films people generally associate them with and yet they formed a highly successful pairing at the box office across seven films out of which six were huge hits and only one flopped.

Moreover, three of those hit films starring the two stars were in the comedy zone and received a lot of love from the audiences.

Here’s a look at the films below:

Jeete Hain Shaan Se (1987)
